get_suitability Function that calculates the log(suitability)

Source: R/get_suitability.R
get_suitability.Rd

get_suitability Function that calculates the log(suitability)

Usage

get_suitability(df, el_pars)

Arguments

df

A data frame with environmental information

el_pars

A list with ellipse parameter. Contains a vector of means and a covariance matrix. Could came from a MLE after optimization or calculated from only presence data.

Value

A vector with suitability

Examples

pars <- get_negloglike_optimr_par(head(spOccPnts, 10), samMPts, fastmode = TRUE, itnmax = 1)
#> fastmode
#> TRUE
#> Optimization starting 
#> Methods used:
#> L-BFGS-B
#> Optimization finished. 
#> L-BFGS-B is the returned method
get_suitability(spOccPnts, pars)
#>  [1] 0.915875581 0.154225911 0.427715315 0.290628590 0.050188570 0.159792513
#>  [7] 0.061976806 0.416796424 0.291835121 0.576855772 0.025699160 0.058407033
